artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Kawaguchiya Shōzō
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 240, chūtanzaku #13.1
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
dimension:
14 3/4 × 5 in. (37.5 × 12.7 cm) (image, sheet, chūtanzaku)
19 × 15 × 1 1/2 in. (48.26 × 38.1 × 3.81 cm) (outer frame)
inscription: こむな夜か　又も有うか　月に雁 {Konna yo ga / mata mo arō ka / tsuki ni kari} (Will it come again / another night like this one? Wild geese and the moon.) [trans. by Alfred H. Marks]
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Untitled series of pictures of flowers and birds with poem in chūtanzaku
title: Geese Flying across Full Moon
